column4: I have install ubuntu 11.04 in D partition and i have win7 in C partition, can i reinstall it without affect ubuntu?
you want to reinstall windows or ubuntu?
then win7 will write to the MBR and grub won't work. you'll have to save the old mbr, reinstall windows and then reinstall grub or put back the mbr
to save the current MBR, open a terminal in Ubuntu and do this: "sudo dd if=/dev/sda of=/home/username/mbr.dat bs=512 count=1"
